start.text: All stations, this is the Captain. Weapons hot, blood ready. Let’s carve our name into their hulls.
General Quarters, General Quarters! The 42nd wakes hungry today, boys!
Power to all batteries. Today the Alliance drinks deep.
Admiral August is watching. Make him smile.
I want their screams on an open channel. Commence firing.

start_boss.text: Look at the size of that magnificent bastard. Finally, something worth killing!
That thing thinks it’s the apex predator? I’m about to teach it a lesson in pain.
Athebyne was just practice. This is the real sermon. All batteries - crucify it.
For the glory of the Alliance! I want its reactor core as a trophy!

engaged.text: Weapons free! Weapons free! Tear their fucking hearts out!
Batteries released - give me maximum rate, I want them bleeding from every seam!
There we go… smell that? That’s fear. Birds away - paint the void with their debris!
You dare fire on the 42nd? I’m going to wear your captain’s spine as a necklace!
All guns, rapid fire! Make them regret waking up this cycle!

pursuing.text: They’re running! Chase them down - nobody escapes the 42nd’s judgment!
Pursuit course, flank speed! I want to taste their engine wash!
Run all you want, prey - I haven’t had my fun yet!
Close the distance! Ram them if you have to - I want their bridge on my prize!

running.text: Negative! We do not retreat! …Fine. Tactical withdrawal - but we’re coming back to burn their worlds for this.
Disengaging… I’ll remember every single one of you that made me do this.
Pulling back. Mark these coordinates. Their gravesite.
Breaking contact. This isn’t fear - it’s me giving them a head start to hell.

hull_90.text: They scratched us! Ha! That tickles. Return fire tenfold!
Minor hit. Good. Now I’m angry.
Armor penetration? Cute. Keep shooting - I’m just getting warmed up.
A love bite. Give them one back, with interest.

hull_50.text: Half hull left? Perfect - less weight, more rage. Press the attack!
We’re bleeding… good. Blood makes the deck slippery for boarding parties.
Fifty percent? That’s still fifty percent more than they’re going to have in a minute!
Damage control - patch it with enemy wreckage if you have to. We are NOT slowing down!

hull_30.text: Hull critical! Excellent! Now we fight like cornered gods!
She’s dying - so let’s take the whole damn fleet with us!
Thirty percent? That’s thirty percent more than enough to ram their bridge!
Reactor’s singing the death song - I love this part! All power to forward guns!
If we go down, we go down as legends! For Admiral August! FOR THE ALLIANCE!

need_help.text: All Alliance ships this net - get in here and taste this glory with me!
I need more wolves on this kill! Vector to my position now!
Brothers of the 42nd, the feast is ready - come claim your share!
Where’s my pack? This prey is too big for one set of jaws!

retreat.text: All units - this fight is beneath us now. Withdraw. We’ll hunt them another day.
Break off. I want them alive… so I can kill them slowly next time.
Tactical withdrawal. Let them think they’ve won. The reckoning will be beautiful.
Pulling out. Save your ammo - we’re coming back with friends.

out_of_missiles.text: VLS dry. Fine. Time to get intimate. All ahead full - ramming speed!
Missiles gone? Good. Now we use the guns like men.
Out of birds. Switch to main batteries - I want to see their faces when we gut them.
No more missiles? Then we do this the old 42nd way - teeth and fury.

overload.text: Flux critical! Beautiful! Vent it - let them see our war-face!
Overload cascade - yes! Ride the lightning, you glorious bastards!
Capacitors screaming! That’s the sound of the Alliance ascending!
Forced vent! Watch them flinch when we come out the other side burning!

death.text: Reactor breach… ha… tell August… I died… THRIVING…
She’s going up… taking half the sector with me… worth it…
This is the Captain… going to meet the enemy in hell… save me a seat at their table…
Core critical… glory… to the Alliance… glory… to me…
If I die… I die the apex predator… see you in the void…

victory.text: All contacts neutralized. The void is ours. I am pleased.
They’re dead. I’m not. Another perfect day.
Enemy scrapped. Someone mount their bridge on my ready room bulkhead.
Field clear. The 42nd’s legend grows - and I’m still hungry.
Victory. Fafnir, your blade sings true through us.

victory_boss.text: The beast is dead! I have its heart! The Alliance will feast tonight!
Major target destroyed. Tell the Admiral his favorite mad dog just bagged a dragon.
It’s down, bleeding, broken - by my hand. The galaxy will speak my name in fear.
Look upon your killer, corpse. The 42nd has spoken - and the void itself kneels.
